QuestData.Title: Mana Manifestations
QuestData.Description: Manafiends are nasty creatures. Small and easy to underestimate, but deadly to our magic casters. The Kirin Tor have these pests crawling all over Violet Rise.$b$bWe will need to handle them carefully. Alone they are easily managed, but in groups they become a different challenge altogether.$b$bGo to Violet Rise and cut down their numbers.
